title: 怎么在僵尸或玩家除外的生物周围召唤生物？
author: 爽濠

replies.author: 正价氟
replies.txt_content:
楼上答案是错误的！正确解法
执行一次:
/scoreboard teams add notarget
高频:
/scoreboard teams join notarget @a
/scoreboard teams join notarget @e[type=Zombie]
假设你现在需要召唤僵尸
/execute @e[team=!notarget] ~ ~ ~ summon Zombie ~ ~ ~
求最佳

/execute @e[type=!Player,type=!Zombie] ~ ~ ~ /summon entityId x y z {NBT}
后面的xyz推荐用~+数字
